body.p: Born on December 30, 1804 in Stokes County, NC. Married to Margaret Rebecca Litton Bostick (1804-1897). Children included John Litton Bostick (1826-1864). Died of Typhoid Fever. Died on February 22, 1861 in Nashville, TN.
